name: Salty Salmon
description:
In Salty Salmon the player controls Salty, a salmon that must avoid obstacles with the help of his water propelled gun in order to get to the sea.

Game Developed by:

Lucía Aguirre (@lulyz419)

Toni Alarcón (@tonimi)

Enrique Albir (@ealbir)

Raúl Hernández (@RulyPuf)

Laura Roldán (@milva)

Daviz Saiz (@gameover55)

Carlos Vicedo (@ojetejohnson)
